alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 17 at 11:52AM EDT until October 18 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Kentucky, southeast Ohio, southwest Virginia and central, northern, southern and western West Virginia. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
